attributes.action: Scrap MODern Housing Solutions contract with the HM Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap Modern Housing Solutions contract.  They are only providing minimal effort repairs and housing to the Armed Forces.  

Delays and neglect are constantly making many of our homes unsafe.  You report a fault with the property and nothing gets done unless you constantly ring up or write a complaint.
